text: Greg Walker (born February 18, 1964) is an American rower. He competed in the men's single sculls event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Mount Clemens, Michigan Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Rowers at the 1987 Pan American Games
title: Greg Walker (rower)
